import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' // import products from '../products' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const[product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProdut = async () =>{ const {data }= await axios.get('/api/products') setProducts(data) } fetchProdut() },[]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

Price : $ {product.price}

Description : {product.description}

{product.countInStock > 0 ? ('In Stock' ) : 'Out Of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
